content: I've been thinking about my business plan a lot lately, and I realized that it's been three months since I started taking it seriously, sitting in a coffee shop on a Saturday morning, brainstorming ideas and making a list of pros and cons. Anyway, back to the UVP. I think my business offers a unique combination of personalized attention and expertise in my industry. I'd like to explore that further and see how I can communicate that effectively to my target audience. Can you give me some tips on how to craft a compelling message that resonates with my audience?
